derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (as an adjective): from Latin equester 'belonging to a horseman' (from eques 'horseman, knight', from equus 'horse') + -ian

entry.def: Equestrian means connected with the activity of riding horses.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or composed of knights
2. of or relating to or featuring horseback riding
